sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 26, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Golf course trails, Hawk Hills and Coyote Run, were rolled on January 24, 2025.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.  All other trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 25th and 26th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The golf course is ROLLED, baby!! It’s thin, but it’s golf course skiing, for which I am grateful. The Metroparks did a very nice job given the lack of snowfall. I skied the gully on the south end by the entrance, but I would super definitely very much not ski it again until we get more snow. Parking lot was PACKED at 2pm on a Friday. Should be a good weekend out here.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The Nubs upper loops are in great  shape with a fresh big groom this morning. LF 7 was the perfect wax of today .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, Rope Tow, and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape with a classic track set.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: The snow conditions continue to be awesome. Yesterday another few inches of snow landed at Nub's. The frequent snowfall has created exceptional conditions on the slopes and the XC trails. NASTAR racing is 12:30 to 2:30 PM on Birch Run today. USSS racing is on Scarface today. There is a junior XC race on the lower trails this morning. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. The Lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
